statistics.name: assists
statistics.description: The number of times a player who passes the ball to a teammate in a way that leads to a score by field goal, meaning that he or she was "assisting" in the basket. There is some judgment involved in deciding whether a passer should be credited with an assist.

statistics.name: turnovers
statistics.description: The number of times a player loses possession to the other team.

statistics.description: The total number of minutes played.

statistics.name: assistTurnoverRatio
statistics.description: The average number of assists a player or team records per turnover

statistics.description: The total number of rebounds (offensive and defensive).

statistics.name: defensiveRebounds
statistics.description: The number of times when the defense obtains the possession of the ball after a missed shot by the offense.

article.headline: Longwood runs past VA Intermont 80-61
article.story: FARMVILLE, Va. -- Tristan Carey scored 20 points to lead Longwood to an easy 80-61 victory over NAIA school Virginia Intermont Tuesday evening. Karl Ziegler had 15 points and Darrion Allen had a career-high 12 for Longwood (5-7). Lucas Woodhouse had his second straight game with 10 assists. Longwood's Leron Fisher opened the scoring with a 3-point jump shot and the Lancers never looked back. Longwood took control on a 17-2 run midway of the first period and were leading 32-13 at the 6:59 mark. They were ahead 42-24 at the half. It was a closer contest in the second half but the Cobras could not overcome the 18 point first half deficit. Joshua Hart led UVI (3-10) with 19 points, eight rebounds and four assists. Tyrone Smith had 15 points, Kris Harris contributed 14 and J.D. Tucker had 13.
